meanings.definition: A horse race over a course equipped with obstacles to be jumped, including ditches and hedges.
meanings.sent1: The steeplechasing event had many spectators cheering for the horses.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching steeplechasing races on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The steeplechasing competition was so exciting that even the birds stopped to watch.
meanings.sent4: Her journey through life felt like a challenging steeplechasing course.
meanings.sent5: The steeplechasing track was filled with hurdles that tested the horses' agility.

meanings.definition: The sport of racing horses in steeplechases.
meanings.sent1: Steeplechasing requires skilled riders and well-trained horses.
meanings.sent2: Many jockeys dream of competing in steeplechasing events.
meanings.sent3: The steeplechasing championship had everyone on the edge of their seats.
meanings.sent4: In the world of steeplechasing, every second counts.
meanings.sent5: The steeplechasing season brings excitement to the equestrian community.

meanings.definition: To participate in or watch steeplechasing.
meanings.sent1: We plan to steeplechase at the upcoming event.
meanings.sent2: She steeplechases with enthusiasm and determination.
meanings.sent3: Let's steeplechase our way to the finish line!
meanings.sent4: He steeplechased through the obstacles effortlessly.
